request.description:
To enable TELNET on IOS use:

enable

conf t
enable password cisco
interface FastEthernet0/0
ip address 192.168.56.122 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
exit
exit

conf t
line vty 0 4
password cisco
login
exec-timeout 40
motd-banner
exit
exit

exec: console.log("Not connected yet ! Too many attempts !")
console.log("Not connected yet ! Waiting, attempt : " + attempt)

request.description:
To enable TELNET on IOS use:

enable

conf t
enable password cisco
interface FastEthernet0/0
ip address 192.168.56.122 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
exit
exit

conf t
line vty 0 4
password cisco
login
exec-timeout 40
motd-banner
exit
exit

exec: tests["Body matches string"] = responseBody.has("Cisco IOS XR");

request.description:
To enable SSH on IOS use:

https://networklessons.com/cisco/ccna-routing-switching-icnd1-100-105/configure-ssh-cisco-ios/


telnet <IP>
 enable
  
 conf t
 enable password cisco
 interface FastEthernet0/0
 ip address 192.168.56.121 255.255.255.0
 no shutdown
 exit
 exit
 
 configure terminal
 hostname R121
 ip domain-name FRINX.LOCAL
 crypto key generate rsa
  1024
 ip ssh version 2
 line vty 0 4
  transport input ssh
  login local
  exit
 username cisco password cisco
 exit

exec: console.log("Not connected yet ! Too many attempts !")
console.log("Not connected yet ! Waiting, attempt : " + attempt)

enable

console.warn("// FIXME this returns data instead of returning 404 for non existing static route")

item.name: TEARDOWN: Delete configuration of static route NATIVE
show router ospf type, ID, interfaces
show nonexisting router ospf type, ID, interfaces

exec: console.warn("// FIXME this returns data instead of returning 404 for non existing static route")
tests["Body matches string"] = responseBody.has("Modular Line Card");
